long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A easy to use chat feature to lessen your everyday work. It is just for fun and a first project test for university. It is a group chat/extension for you to communicate and message others easily through just an extension. You have to create a group chat through the group chat website as there is only one test  group. It works through an embeded iframe window.
